item.title: Gluon fusion to diphoton plus jets with amplitude neural networks
item.description: Our new paper Optimising simulations for diphoton production at hadron colliders using amplitude neural networks was listed on the arXiv today. I posted about the code for this project yesterday.

item.title: PhD first year report: real QCD corrections
item.description: The time has come for my first year progress assessment. Here’s my report.
